    eofindices

    A suite of tools used to calculate and display Ecosystem overfishing indices (EOF)

    • Primary Production Required (PPR)1

    • Mean Trophic Level

    • Ryther Index2

    • Fogarty Index2

    Installation

    remotes::install_github("NOAA-EDAB/eofindices")

    Usage

    • See the vignette for a walkthrough of the functions
    • See the most recent worked example for details on how to use this package.
    • or the Tech doc for overview of the methodology

    Footnote:

    1Pauly, D, and V Christensen. 1995a. “Primary production required to sustain global fisheries.” Nature 374: 255–57. https://doi.org/https://doi.org/10.1038/374255a0.

    2J. S. Link, R. A. Watson, Global ecosystem overfishing: Clear delineation within real limits to production. Sci. Adv. 5, eaav0474 (2019). DOI: 10.1126/sciadv.aav0474
